hero.title: Products Categories

hero.title: Products
hero.description: We provide a wide array of textile products, from raw fibers to finished technical fabrics, tailored to meet your specific needs.

notFound.categoryDescription: Sorry, we couldn't find the category for "{{categorySlug}}".
notFound.productDescription: Sorry, we couldn't find the product you're looking for.

common.noProducts: No specific products for this category.

product.headline: Our
product.description: Explore our diverse range of high-quality textile products and solutions.

dyesChemical.title: DYES CHEMICAL
dyesChemical.description: High-performance dyes and specialty chemicals for various textile applications.

products.name: Acid Dyes
products.description: High-quality anionic dyes ideal for coloring protein fibers such as wool, silk, and nylon. Known for vibrant colors and excellent lightfastness.

products.name: Reactive Dyes
products.description: Forms a strong, covalent bond with cellulosic fibers like cotton and linen. Offers superior wash-fastness and brilliant shades.

products.name: Textile Pigment Emulsion
products.description: A versatile pigment solution used for textile printing. Provides excellent coverage and is suitable for a wide range of fabrics.

products.name: Colour for Food
products.description: Safe, certified colorants specifically formulated for use in food and beverage products, meeting all regulatory standards.

products.name: Speciality Chemicals
products.description: Auxiliary chemicals including fixing agents, softeners, and leveling agents to enhance the dyeing and finishing process.

fashionMaterials.title: FASHION MATERIALS
fashionMaterials.description: Premium fabrics and materials for the modern fashion industry.

products.name: Knitted Fabric
products.description: High-quality jersey, interlock, and rib-knit fabrics perfect for apparel. Known for their stretch, comfort, and breathability.

halalProduct.title: HALAL PRODUCT
halalProduct.description: Certified halal products meeting requisite standards.

products.name: Ihram
products.description: Seamless, 100% cotton white garments for Hajj and Umrah. Designed for comfort and adherence to religious requirements.

products.name: Mukena
products.description: Beautifully crafted prayer garments for women, made from cooling and comfortable materials like cotton or silk.

naturalFibers.title: NATURAL FIBERS
naturalFibers.description: Sustainable and eco-friendly natural fibers for diverse applications.

products.name: Rami
products.description: A strong, lustrous natural fiber known for its durability and resistance to bacteria. Similar in feel to high-quality linen.

products.name: Kenaf
products.description: A sustainable and durable bast fiber commonly used for cordage, sacking, and industrial composite materials.

products.name: Nanas
products.description: Fine and lightweight fiber (Piña) extracted from pineapple leaves, prized for its natural sheen in luxury textiles.

specialFiber.title: SPECIAL FIBER
specialFiber.description: Advanced fibers engineered for specific high-tech functions.

products.name: Nano Fiber
products.description: Ultra-fine fibers with diameters in the nanometer range, offering exceptional properties for filtration, medical, and electronics.

technicalTextile.title: TECHNICAL TEXTILE MATERIALS
technicalTextile.description: Innovative textiles designed for performance, safety, and industrial use.

products.name: Cut Resistance Fabric
products.description: Engineered with high-performance fibers (e.g., Kevlar®) to protect against sharp objects. Ideal for gloves and protective apparel.

products.name: Water Repellent Fabric
products.description: Treated with advanced coatings (DWR) to make water bead up and roll off, keeping the user dry in wet conditions.

products.name: Bulletproof Fabric
products.description: Aramid-based ballistic fabrics designed to stop projectiles. Used in personal body armor and vehicle protection.

products.name: Material For Life Vest Jacket
products.description: Highly buoyant, water-resistant, and durable materials certified for personal flotation devices (PFDs).

products.name: Textile for safety
products.description: High-visibility, flame-retardant (FR), and anti-static textiles for comprehensive personal protective equipment (PPE).

products.name: Textile for Automotive
products.description: Durable fabrics for vehicle interiors, including seating, headliners, carpets, and airbag components.

products.name: Textile for construction
products.description: Geotextiles used for soil stabilization, erosion control, and reinforcement in construction projects.

products.name: Non woven fabric
products.description: Fabrics made from fibers bonded together chemically or thermally. Used in filters, medical supplies, and disposables.

textileAccessories.title: TEXTILE ACCESSORIES
textileAccessories.description: A complete range of accessories to finish your textile products.

products.name: Webbing
products.description: Strong, narrow-woven fabric used for straps, belts, and handles in bags, safety equipment, and apparel.

products.name: Interlining
products.description: Fabric layer placed between the lining and the outer fabric to add shape, structure, and support to garments.

products.name: Buckle
products.description: Durable metal and plastic buckles for fastening straps, available in various sizes and styles.

products.name: Zipper
products.description: High-quality coil, metal, and plastic zippers for apparel, bags, and industrial applications.

products.name: Button
products.description: A wide variety of buttons in different materials, sizes, and colors to match any design aesthetic.

textileMachineries.title: TEXTILE MACHINERIES
textileMachineries.description: Reliable new and second-hand machinery for textile production.

products.name: Second Hand Machinery
products.description: Refurbished and well-maintained second-hand textile machinery, offering a cost-effective solution for production.

wovenFabric.title: WOVEN FABRIC
wovenFabric.description: Versatile woven fabrics including Bemberg, RFP, and custom prints.

products.name: Bemberg
products.description: A high-quality regenerated cellulose fiber (Cupro), known for its silky-smooth feel and excellent breathability. Often used as a premium lining.

products.name: RFP Fabric
products.description: Recycled Polyester Fabric (RFP) made from post-consumer materials. A sustainable choice for eco-conscious apparel.

products.name: Customise printed fabric
products.description: Your design, our fabric. We offer high-resolution digital and screen printing services on a variety of woven bases.

yarn.title: YARN
yarn.description: High-quality yarns from natural and technical fibers.

products.name: Yarn From Bast And Leaf Fiber
products.description: Strong and rustic yarns spun from natural fibers like linen, hemp, rami, and kenaf. Ideal for durable textiles.

products.name: Technical Yarn
products.description: Yarns engineered with specific properties, such as flame retardancy, cut resistance, or high strength for industrial use.

cta.waMessage: Hello, I'm interested in the product: {{productName}}
